verses.name: Revelation 2:10
verses.text: Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.

verses.name: Revelation 2:11
verses.text: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; He that overcometh shall not be hurt of the second death.

verses.name: Revelation 2:12
verses.text: And to the angel of the church in Pergamos write; These things saith he which hath the sharp sword with two edges;
